segments.text: Yes , we have many kinds of pies and puddings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you give us more information ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We have lemon pies , apple pies , coffee rum pies and ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to have the coffee rum pies .
segments.speaker: S1
